Changelog:
Build 2024.6.8.979
- Fixed a client crash.

Build 2024.6.8.942
- Fixed addon config saving, even if the loader couldn't be initiated due to a system error.
- Removed 30 minute cache restriction for Nexus updates.
- Added log message for successful chainload.
- Added flag for synchronous addon unload.
- Changed "ILCreateFromPathA" to the more modern version "SHParseDisplayName" for better Linux compatibility.
- Fixed a bug where the addon library would install the last item in a release instead of the first.
- Changed the startup info log messages.
- Fixed the console logger not working when starting with "-ggconsole".
- Reworked the entire update logic.
- Moved changelog into Options window.
- Added "Return to game" button in menu.
- Fixed debug menu showing even when the dev mode was not enabled.
- Added authors to library.
- Added highlighting for new addons.
- Major internal reworks.
- Fixed addon sorting.
- Added option for addons to check updates themselves, but request Nexus to download the new dll. (Revision 4)
- Added highlighting for addons that are disabled until update.
- Added option to enable prereleases for GitHub hosted addons.
- Stylised the EULA window.
- Added option to pop up the Addons window when addons get disabled due to a game update.
- Added runtime font loading for addons. Thanks HeavyMetalPirate.2695! (Revision 4)
- Implemented keybind release triggers for addons. (Revision 4)
- Updated ArcDPS integration with new events. Check the api-cdi repo for implementation details. Thanks Subi!
